name: Preschool
description: This is a Spanish-immersion play-based preschool. 2-5-Year-Old Preschool class programs that are mixed-age classroom. The mixed-age classrooms generate a family of learners who support and care for one another. Older children have the opportunity to serve as mentors and take leadership roles. Younger children can have peer role models. ​
